<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af1e2fadd428afdc0b913cdd462f2fbae"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::optional&lt;unsigned&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af1e2fadd428afdc0b913cdd462f2fbae">getMaxNTID</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: The semantics here are a bit strange. The PTX ISA states the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// following (11.4.2. Performance-Tuning Directives: .maxntid):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  Note that this directive guarantees that the total number of threads does</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  not exceed the maximum, but does not guarantee that the limit in any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  particular dimension is not exceeded.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::optional&lt;unsigned&gt; MaxNTIDx = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a455adedaedfed89dd606c5747836f9d7">getMaxNTIDx</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::optional&lt;unsigned&gt; MaxNTIDy = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1b03c8f10c4958d7b7604712e150c9dd">getMaxNTIDy</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::optional&lt;unsigned&gt; MaxNTIDz = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a403ee9f173277aed198633b4632977a3">getMaxNTIDz</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MaxNTIDx || MaxNTIDy || MaxNTIDz)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxNTIDx.value&#95;or(1) &#42; MaxNTIDy.value&#95;or(1) &#42; MaxNTIDz.value&#95;or(1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::nullopt;</span></CodeLine>
